pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========Overview========Creating heat and power demand profiles from annual values.* Free software: MIT licenseInstallation============:: pip install demandlibYou can also install the in-development version with:: pip install https://github.com/oemof/demandlib/archive/master.zipDocumentation=============https://demandlib.readthedocs.io/Development===========To run all the tests run:: toxNote, to combine the coverage data from all the tox environments run:.. list-table:: :widths: 10 90 :stub-columns: 1 - - Windows - :: set PYTEST_ADDOPTS=--cov-append tox - - Other - :: PYTEST_ADDOPTS=--cov-append tox
